title: 820-3115 no backlight
message:
Hi all,

I have a 820-3115 that has 0 volts on PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT .

I have 5 volts into U9701 (i have replaced this but no change)

I also have pubs voltage at Q9706 but 0 volts coming out.

On pin 3 of Q9706 for LCDBKLT_EN_DIV i have 12.20v.

Any ideas what's going on?

Thanks

title: 820-3115 no backlight
message:
Update - i think this may be a no video issue. I am missing PP3V3_LCDVDD_SW but on U9000 i have voltage in but not out.

pin 1 LCD_IG_PWR_EN = 0 volts

title: 820-3115 no backlight
message: Does the board chime? What is the history?

title: 820-3115 no backlight
message: Not to worry Duke - this one had so many issues it wasn’t worth it. Sent it back!
